description.value: The focused power of your flurry threatens to overwhelm your opponent. When you target the same creature with two Strikes from your @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Flurry of Blows]{Flurry of Blows}, you can try to stun the creature. If either Strike hits and deals damage, the target must succeed at a Fortitude save against your class DC or be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Stunned]{Stunned 1} (or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Stunned]{Stunned 3} on a critical failure). This is an incapacitation effect.

rules.text: {item|name} The target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.data.data.attributes.classDC.value)|traits:incapacitation] save against your class DC or be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Stunned]{Stunned 1} (or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Stunned]{Stunned 3} on a critical failure).
